TEXT.S: = Phuma egu bunga = Hani miyan msterung ciida,kingal ali,nikan kingal rudan alang miyan meyah qmita qbsuran mu rseno, klaun na hani nami msterung, mhulis qmita yami ma smiling,"Knuwan namu phuma bunga di Walis?ã€ž Maanu mesa ku lmngelung"ini ku phuma bunga wa!"mesa ku,"Knuwan namu tuting laqi sa rudan nii,salu mntena bunga nii egu laqi namu si"! Mesa qbsuran mu.
